articles.title: Service stations to face delays in passing on petrol price relief - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The Australasian Convenience and Petroleum Marketers Association says retailers are likely to pass on savings to customers to stay competitive but some won’t be able to do so immediately.
articles.content: Oil prices, which were already marching higher due to global supplies failing to keep pace with rebounding post-coronavirus pandemic demand, have been driven up further by rolling sanctions placed on… [+2183 chars]

articles.title: Oscars 2022: Troy Kotsur wins best supporting actor for CODA - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description:
LOS ANGELES, March 27 : Troy Kotsur became the first deaf man to win an Oscar, taking the Academy Award on Sunday for best supporting actor for his role as a fisherman and father in family drama "CODA."

Kotsur, 53, has worked for over three decades in thea…
